text:
Kaptaan saab!! kaise ho.
Avhaan ka to alag hi experience tha yarr. Mumbai me ghoomne ka credit to poora Gill ko hi jata hai ðŸ˜…. Unko kisi se na milna hota to shayad hum bhi na ja pate. 
Yarr InterIIT jeetna sapna hi reh jayega ðŸ˜”. socha tha teri kaptani me to pakka jeetenge per....
Aur haan desperation ki baat tu to mat hi kar bro sab ko pata hai kon kitna desperate hai ðŸ˜‚..Tere alag hi kisse hai summer camp se lekar interIIT tak ke....yha bata nhi saktaðŸ˜….
Antaragni me to tum logo ne Dare diya tha isliye wo sab kiya tha ðŸ˜…
Best of luck for future endeavour bhai. Hope you will play cricket at the highest level.
Last but not the least Stay Connected!!
CheersðŸ¤ž

text:
Yo Maddhesiya boi...
Bhai you had made the whole summer camp memorable. 
A person always in jolly mood (anybody wants to relieve stress spend sometime with him).
You have the zeal to do something greater. Best of luck boi for the future endeavour. 
Stay in touch mate!

text:

text:
Hey !
We haven't interacted much.......know you from treasure hunt...Single person army of "Kanpuriya Master Spies". Shayad sirf tumhari wajah se hi hamari team treasure hunt ke last round tak pahuch payi thi.

text:
Same school, same coaching (same batch), same college ...... and many more similarities. 
But different branch and hall ne bhale hi kuch dooriyan banadi ho per umeed karte hai humesha milte rahe, sath bana rahe.
Bhai jald hi football khelne ka intejam karo yarr.

text:
Yo Sketching buddy!!
Kafi acha laga tumse milkar bro. You are a pure soul , always seems to be in jolly mood that is what is the best quality about you. It was great to spent common space at Robotics club during summer camp. Bhai tumhari team ki wajah se hi best implemented award mila coz most of the project was mechanical. Bhai milte hai fir. Best of luck for future.

text:
Bhaiya chapu to aap bachpan se hi hai. Chahiye acads ho, extra-curricular ho, POR ho ya BANDIYAN ho (multiple ðŸ˜Ž) har jagah apka chapna hota hi hai. 
The time I had spent with you during 9th& 10th had brought me lot changes  as a person. Tu uss batch me padta tha jha hum soch bhi nhi sakte the  I used to wonder how would you able to manage at that time. I used to compete with you , used to learn from you, try to imitate your way and that had brought me a lot of positive changes in me. 
And it was fortunate that we landed up in same college ðŸ™‚. 
All the best mate for future endeavour. 
Stay connected!
CheersðŸ¤ž
